FuncDef: This command configures the identifier of an RSVP P2MP LSP. An RSVP P2MP LSP is fully identified by the combination of: <P2MP ID, tunnel ID, extended tunnel ID> part of the P2MP session object, and <tunnel sender address, LSP ID> fields in the p2mp sender_template object.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a P2MP identifier. Values-0 to 65535.
